title: The Making of the river [B&W]
brief_description: Shows how a river forms from many sources: the clouds, melting snow in the mountains and underground springs. It flows throufh canyons and forests, making waterfalls and sometimes quiet pools. Also shows plant and animal life it passes on the journey to the sea, gathering water from joining streams.
